DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound Guided Thoracic Paravertebral Block Percutaneous Nephrolithotomy Operations Children
DOC.detailed_description: This study perform approval Ethics Committee parent write consent . Between age 1-5 , plan percutaneous nephrolithotomy due kidney stone 40 patient enrol study , patient randomly divide two group . All patient perform general anaesthesia . The Group I patient give ultrasound guide thoracic paravertebral block 0.5 ml/kg bupivacaine % 0.5 give prone position Group II patient give 15 mg/kg paracetamol postoperative analgesia . In period postoperative , FLACC > 4 ; plan dose 1 mg/kg tramadol . Patients ' hemodynamic parameter , oxygen saturation , sevoflurane concentration record 10 , 15 , 30 60 minute intraoperatively . Patients ' hemodynamic parameter , oxygen saturation , pain score ( FLACC ) , satisfaction parent , number patient additional analgesic requirement side effect ( nausea , vomit , hypotension , bradycardia , respiration problem etc ) record postoperative period . Primary outcome measure pain score use FLACC scale .
